sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-panel
    title="Transfer"
    label="Transactions History"
    double="true"
    secondPrimary="true"
  >
    <template #form-wrap>
      <Form
        :title="'Amount in ' + currency"
        subtitle="1% comission"
        type="text"
        value="0.01"
      />
      <Form
        title="Select currency"
        type="select"
        selectWidth="100%"
        :options="wallets.map(wallet => wallet.currency.capitalize())"
      />
      <Form title="Address to transfer" type="text" value="" isAddress="true" />
      <Button class="pay_button" theme="secondary_big" text="Transfer" />
    </template>
    <template #second-form-wrap> </template>
  </v-panel>
</template>

<script>
import Button from '../Button.vue';
import Form from '../Form.vue';
import { mapGetters } from 'vuex';

export default {
  name: 'Transfer',
  components: {
    Form,
    Button,
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapGetters({
      wallets: 'auth/profileWallets',
      currency: 'popups/exchangeSelectedCurrency',
    }),
  },
};
</script>

<style lang="sass" scoped>
@import "../../../../scss/smart-grid"
@import "../../../../scss/variables"

.pay_button
  margin-top: 20px
  width: 100px

  @include xs-block
    width: calc(100% - 38px)
  @include sm-block
    width: calc(100% - 38px)
  @include md-block
    width: 100px
  @include lg-block
    width: 100px
</style>
